name: Abundant
headline: On-demand human workforce for AI agents
description:
Abundant powers reliable and safe AI deployment with real-time human expertise. Our network of specialized operators works alongside AI agents to:

(1) Handle complex edge cases with precision.
(2) Maintain rigorous safety standards.
(3) Generate high-quality training data that continuously improves AI performance.

Companies can meet stringent quality requirements at a fraction of the cost of in-house teams, while accelerating their AI initiatives.
tags: industry:aiops; industry:developer-tools; industry:recruiting; industry:collaboration; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jesse Hu, Founder
founders.description: Working towards an abundant future. ex-Waymo ML engineer.

founders.name: Meji Abidoye, Founder
founders.description: A human workforce for your AI agents

## Flawless execution, every time
## Flawless execution, every time
We make your agents reliable even when unexpected failures occur.
### Human-in-the-Loop Reliability
Abundant's expert workforce can fill the gaps in your product experience
Seamlessly route edge cases to human operators
Maintain high performance even when models fail
Increase success rates from 60% to 100%

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/fN12Y24VuMhOOWtztvassUZ8M.png)

## FAQs
Why do I need this tool?
If your agents are still stuck at 60-90% reliability or you want training data to build a moat around your domain-specific interactions, you need humans in the loop. Our staffing network and services makes sure you don't waste hundreds hours on sourcing, interviewing and training each candidate.

generated_description:
## Abundant: The On-Demand Workforce for AI Agents

Founded in 2024 and hailing from Y Combinator’s Batch F24, Abundant is on a mission to provide an **on-demand human workforce** that enhances the reliability and safety of AI deployment. Based in San Francisco, the company operates with a small, agile team of three and is headed by Diana Hu, a Group Partner at Y Combinator.

### What They Do

Abundant supports AI agents with real-time human expertise, which is crucial for addressing those complex edge cases that AI struggles with. Here’s how they’re making a difference:

1. **Handling Complex Edge Cases**: Their specialized operators ensure that unexpected scenarios are managed with precision.
   
2. **Maintaining Safety Standards**: Abundant adheres to rigorous quality controls, providing peace of mind when deploying AI solutions.
   
3. **Generating High-Quality Training Data**: They collect and refine training data that helps continuously improve the performance of AI models.

### Why Choose Abundant?

By leveraging Abundant’s services, companies can significantly reduce costs compared to maintaining in-house teams, while accelerating their AI initiatives. Their offering is especially attractive to businesses that want to enhance their operational efficiency without sacrificing quality.

### Key Features

- **Human-in-the-Loop Reliability**: Their human operators can step in when things go wrong, ensuring that AI agents maintain high performance, even in failure scenarios. This approach reportedly boosts success rates from 60% to 100%.
  
- **Enterprise-Ready Infrastructure**: Companies can scale human operations flexibly, integrating seamlessly with existing workflows and systems without the hassles of managing operator training or privacy concerns.

- **Imitation Training Data**: This feature allows continuous data collection from human responses, leading to automated improvements in AI models.

### Use Cases

Abundant serves a vast array of industries, from healthcare tech to legal tech, effectively sourcing domain-specific experts for tasks like high-quality annotation and data collection. Clients have seen improvements like a 50% reduction in mistakes and up to **9x faster deployment times**.

### Conclusion

In a world increasingly reliant on artificial intelligence, companies face the challenge of ensuring their systems are not just efficient but reliable and safe. Abundant bridges that gap by offering a workforce that is ready to intervene where AI alone may falter. With its innovative approach and foundation in strong technical expertise, Abundant is poised to be a key player in the future of AI operations.

For more details, visit [Abundant.ai](https://www.abundant.ai/).
